# Family Cookbook - LLM Documentation

This project is a reactive family cookbook application built with Next.js, Convex, and Gemini AI.

## Architecture
- **Frontend**: Next.js 15 (App Router), Tailwind CSS, Shadcn/UI.
- **Backend**: Convex (Reactive Database & Serverless Functions).
- **AI**: Gemini 2.0 Flash used for recipe extraction from URLs and images.
- **Auth**: @convex-dev/auth (Password-based).

## Key Files
- `convex/schema.ts`: Database schema for cookbooks, recipes, and shares.
- `convex/recipes.ts`: Contains AI "agents" for data extraction.
- `convex/cookbooks.ts`: Logic for cookbook management and copying.
- `app/(app)/cookbooks/[id]/add-recipe/page.tsx`: Frontend entry for AI extraction.

## External Documentation
- Convex: https://www.convex.dev/llms.txt
- Vercel: https://vercel.com/llms.txt
- Shadcn: Follows standard Radix/Tailwind patterns.

## API Keys
- Requires `GEMINI_API_KEY` in Convex environment variables.
